reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major mood disorders: major depressive disorder (~400), bipolar I (~20), bipolar II (~30), persistent depressive disorder (~100), other specified mood disorders (~50), cyclothymia (~30), adjustment disorder with mood (~100), plus recurrent episodes = ~1,200 per 100k. Low confidence due to heterogeneity, overlap between categories, and uncertainty about whether incidence includes recurrent episodes.
